content: in this legal case the harju county court made a ruling after 9 months on 07062023 the defendant has been ordered to pay the procedural costs which include unspecified amounts there is also an additional cost of 420 eur that will be determined later the courts final decision referred to as court dec is a default judgment made on behalf of the republic of estonia this means that the defendant did not respond or participate in the case the court has deemed this default judgment immediately enforceable without any guarantee the document is digitally signed the text does not provide specific details about the case or the parties involved but it mentions various steps in the legal process such as filing a complaint submitting evidence and scheduling a hearing it also mentions the involvement of legal representatives for both parties
